author: Sarah Young, Sarah Young
title: Coronavirus: How to clean your groceries and stay safe when food shopping
description: Here is everything you need to know about grocery shopping
content:
With lockdown conditions imposed on the UK, the majority of the nations daily routines have come to halt with activities such as food shopping being kept to a bare minimum.
Some of the biggest public concerns surrounding the outbreak so far have been related… [+7151 chars]
